description: At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives.Job Description Summary:What you need to know about the role- Provide independent validation of high impact regulatory models (e.g. Complaints models), with substantial use of Natural Language Processing (NLP) models and Generative AI.Meet our teamYou will be joining AI/Model Risk Management Team within Enterprise Financial Risk Oversight unit, focusing on, but not limited to, independent quantitative model validation of high impact AI/models used firmwide. You will play a critical role in ensuring best in class model development, safe adoption and responsible uses, following regulatory guidance/requirements and best industry practices.Job Description:Your way to impact You will help identify enhancement opportunities through model validation, communicate to model owners and developers, and ensure timely remediation. Your work will help ensure compliance with requirements from various regulatory agencies and external audits and better customer services.Your day to day In your day to day role you willSupport the lead in providing oversight of high-impact statistical models and AI applications in various business functional areas, focusing on but not limited to Natural Language Processing (NLP) models and Generative AI.Conduct quantitative and qualitative model validation in line with internal Model Risk Management Policy and industry standard to identify and report issues arising from model data, model design and model use, provide subject-matter expert opinion on model enhancementCollaborate with business units and model developers to ensure model issues are agreed and remediated timelyWhat do you need to bring- This position requires the curiosity and ability to learn various advanced modeling techniques, covering a broader business function. This role also requires candidate to have the capability in building effective relationship with stakeholders from various teams such as data science, engineering, product, customer service/complaints, compliance, audit.An advanced degree in a quantitative field, such as statistics, econometrics, finance, mathematics, computer science, data science, engineeringAdvanced statistical and deep learning model development experience with solid understanding of NLP modeling and optimization techniques including text, voice and image processing.Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in NLP, such as Python, and libraries/frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, spaCy, or other deep learning toolkits.Ability to research on latest AI/ML advancements and explore opportunities for innovationAbility to maintain technical documentation of AI/ML model development and validationAbility to work effectively both independently and in a team environment and deliver timelyAbility to communicate and present effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders at various levelsExperience working with Large Language Models, such as GPT-4, Llama 2 and other commercial or open-source models is a plus**We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don't hesitate to apply.Additional Job Description:Subsidiary:PayPalTravel Percent:0Our Benefits:At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.comWho We Are:Click Here to learn more about our culture and community.PayPal has remained at the forefront of the digital payment revolution for more than 20 years. By leveraging technology to make financial services and commerce more convenient, affordable, and secure, the PayPal platform is empowering more than 400 million consumers and merchants in more than 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy. For more information, visit paypal.com.PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join Our Talent Community.
highlights:
Qualifications:
 What do you need to bring- This position requires the curiosity and ability to learn various advanced modeling techniques, covering a broader business function, This role also requires candidate to have the capability in building effective relationship with stakeholders from various teams such as data science, engineering, product, customer service/complaints, compliance, audit, An advanced degree in a quantitative field, such as statistics, econometrics, finance, mathematics, computer science, data science, engineering, Advanced statistical and deep learning model development experience with solid understanding of NLP modeling and optimization techniques including text, voice and image processing, Proficiency in programming languages commonly used in NLP, such as Python, and libraries/frameworks like TensorFlow, PyTorch, spaCy, or other deep learning toolkits, Ability to research on latest AI/ML advancements and explore opportunities for innovation, Ability to maintain technical documentation of AI/ML model development and validation, Ability to work effectively both independently and in a team environment and deliver timely, Ability to communicate and present effectively to both technical and non-technical stakeholders at various levels, 
Responsibilities:
 You will play a critical role in ensuring best in class model development, safe adoption and responsible uses, following regulatory guidance/requirements and best industry practices, Job Description:Your way to impact You will help identify enhancement opportunities through model validation, communicate to model owners and developers, and ensure timely remediation, Your work will help ensure compliance with requirements from various regulatory agencies and external audits and better customer services, Support the lead in providing oversight of high-impact statistical models and AI applications in various business functional areas, focusing on but not limited to Natural Language Processing (NLP) models and Generative AI.Conduct quantitative and qualitative model validation in line with internal Model Risk Management Policy and industry standard to identify and report issues arising from model data, model design and model use, provide subject-matter expert opinion on model enhancement, Collaborate with business units and model developers to ensure model issues are agreed and remediated timely,
